data.title: Great Staff & Clean Hotel
data.text: Nice pricing, environment, and staff was Outstanding and went above and beyond to make sure our stay was a pleasant one ..  I Came to check in as I had a reservation and the lovely lady at the Front desk Which was Jessica  Happily checked me in even though I was informed that check in time was not until 3:00 pm . But she made the check in process   fast & pleasurable one that's for sure and let Me check in Early  . My room was very nice   It was clean  and had a comfortable bed as  I just loved the space that was provided in the room . Will stay at again.  Breakfast was Simple Had many choices only thing is  You Should reconsider putting tables and chairs for breakfast for guest to  Eat at . Check out process was Great as well Kathryn is who checked me out and she was very Pleasant as well .  I will be staying again on My Next trip ..

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Ashley S,
We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We will be sure to pass this review along to our staff.  We appreciate your business and we look forward to your future business.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Horrible awful place!!!
data.text: We checked into motel without looking at the rooms, big mistake very dirty and moldy! We went to desk and was told our money would be refunded the next week.  Called on Monday manager was very rude and we were told that was not a valid reason to refund our money.  Very poor customer service!! I would have thought it would have been in the best interest of them to refund our money.  I have definitely put out the word to many people to avoid that place, you would be better off to sleep in your car.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Djbender2016,
I apologize for the poor service you received.  I will talk with our staff to ensure our guests receive professional customer service.  Again, I apologize.  

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: It was clean...mostly
data.text:
The showerhead was nice, and the shower itself had the curved curtain rod so you had more space.  The bathroom was spotless, though small, and the hotel was clean.  That is all it had going for it...well, breakfast did have waffles.

The rest of breakfast consisted of boxed cereal, instant oatmeal, and some pastries.

It was run down, pipes running down the walls, rusty looking, only one night stand, and there was a wide gap around the room door.  When the lights were out in the room, you could see the hall light, and clearly hear people in the halls.  People were in the halls and parking lot all night long, drunk, loud people.  I felt alarmed and didn't sleep, not to mention, the bed was painful.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Sonjab279,
Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  We apologize for the loud guests outside and in the hall and we will make sure our staff keeps other guests quiet so everyone feels comfortable.  Thank you for letting us know.

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Staff !
data.text: My Stay was Good When i arrived to check in that went smooth ,My Room had a very comfortable bed could use alittle  love in the room but over all was clean and comfortable ! Breakfast in the Am was short sweet and simple , The Lovely Lady at the frontdesk was very professional and very helpful she was always smiling and because of her i will be returning Thank You Jessica !

data.title: Beware!
data.text: Decided to stay elsewhere as reviews not good. Charged for a night we cancelled with free cancellation,well within time limit by weeks. Charged to credit card weeks after intended stay. Have complained still waiting on reply. Not happy! Card details obviously retained.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Sue K,
We apologize for the mistake.  Please contact us so we can resolve this issue properly.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great hotel for the price
data.text: When money is an issue National 9 is a good, clean, comfortable option. It's no 5 star hotel, but for the price, it can't be beat. Nothing fancy, but I paid less than $60 a room, which was clean and comfortable with a continental breakfast, honestly couldn't ask for more at that price. I've stayed at plenty of cheap hotels, this chain is the best at the cheaper price range.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Scotty C,
We are pleased to hear that you found great value in your stay with us.  Our staff works hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and well taken care of.  We appreciate your business and we hope you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice for older hotel
data.text:
Stayed here for a couple nights on our way to Cheyenne for Frontier days. Our room was clean and the beds comfortable. The manager, Catherine, accommodated all our requests even when we asked for 6 towels! Lots of kids and a teenage girl who thinks she needs two towels per shower. The breakfast wasn't bad. Baked good, waffles, cereal, juice, milk, and as much coffee as I could drink. Would have enjoyed a protein but got what I expected for a smaller hotel. Thank you for the good stay, we'll definitely be back!
-D

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Johntraveler70,
Thank you for the review!  We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us while on the way to Cheyenne.  We appreciate our guests feedback very much and we look forward to your future business.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Be Cautious
data.text: Room wasn't to bad but was booked for the 2 of us and had 1 washcloth and 1 towel, the young man at the desk got us more cheerfully as soon as I asked. The breakfast was OK, not the best but you have to take it back to your room or sit on the couch and hold it on your lap. I have a habit of putting my wallet in the pillowcase (since having it stolen in a hotel in Calif. in the early sixties) I discovered the next morning when I was 200 miles away that I had not taken my wallet. We called back at 10:20 AM (before the room was occupied) and ask if they had found it. Surprise, Surprise they didn't and still haven't to my knowledge. I have called and am told someone will call you back but that doesn't happen. As far as I'm concerned it is theft. There was over 200.00 cash plus licenses., etc. in the wallet.

owner_response.author: Casper99, Owner at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear LarryMc1,

First let me apologize  for the unhappiness you had at our location.  I am sorry you lost your wallet.  We found it odd that you called our manager and said that we had better mail the $200 or you would write a bad review on trip advisor.  Our manager personally searched the room to no avail.  Had we found it we would have found a way to return it to you.  I also find it interesting that the visa you used when you checked in is still active, had your wallet been misplaced wouldn't you have had the credit card company cancel the card ?
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: You get what you pay for,
data.text: This placed needs A LOT of TLC.  Room had bread crumbs on the floor.  Everywhere you look needs to be repainted or recarpeted.  Their continental breakfast is easily the most lame of the past 30 + hotels/motels we have stayed in.  BUT, you get what you pay for.. it was the only room left on rodeo week.  On the plus side, it was 2 minute drive to the Casper Event Center for the rodeo.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us.  We are disappointed to hear about your unsatisfactory stay.  We appreciate your feedback and we hope that we can earn your business back in the future.  

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not worth the money savings
data.text: My husband and I booked two nights here through Hotwire.com. Every hotel in Casper is pretty expensive, so this place seemed like a good deal. It was not worth the money saved. The entire building smelled like cigarette smoke. I thought it would be better in our room, but the smell was there too. Even after opening the window for several hours, I had an asthma attack due to the smell. The bed was lopsided, and I kept rolling into the middle of it all night. The sheets had holes in them and the sink faucet was leaky. We didn't even want to stay there once we saw it, but every other hotel was booked up. We canceled our 2nd night and are gladly paying about twice as much for a different hotel. When we complained at the front desk and asked to cancel, the woman told us that her computer wasn't working and there was nothing she could do for us. Trust that I am a pretty low-maintenance traveler, but this place was too rough for me to handle.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Heather H,
We apologize for your unsatisfactory stay with us and that our staff wasn't helpful.  We will talk with our staff, to ensure all guests issues are resolved quickly.  Again we apologize and we hope that we can earn your business back in the future.  

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: There you go here we are rest at last
data.text: Stayed there on 4/21/2016. Very nice, we had what we need but felt like we had more.. Staff was great rooms were clean. We had a good time in Casper and staying here helped make our stay a little nicer.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review

data.title: Very pleasantly surprised
data.text: I enjoyed my stay here, I even booked a second night when I realized I needed to stay an additional day. My room was on the ground floor and the walls were made of brick which made it quite noise proof especially being along a busy highway. The bed was very comfortable and they had a full breakfast, but mostly I was impressed with the staff. The front desk staff was quite accommodating and made me feel safe. I definitely would recommend this hotel.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much.  We work very hard to make our guests feel welcome and comfortable, and we are glad that you were.  We appreciate your business and we hope that you will stay with us again soon.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nope.. Just nope
data.text: Now before I say anything I realize that things can happen anywhere and as someone who has a strict budget, I just wanted somewhere to clean to sleep and to work on homework before heading out on the road tomorrow. Still, I can't in my good conscious recommend this hotel. It's not very clean, the carpets are stained and look like they need vacuumed, the bedding looks like someone fell asleep with a cigarette in his or hand and was burned, and the AC unit was boarded up. On top of it all, it wasn't pleasant to have the police raid the room across from you at 3 in the morning because someone tried to murder the other. No wonder my dog was on edge all night. I will give that the staff is nice and accommodating, but in all honesty, there is now way I would stay here again. It just doesn't seem like a good neighborhood all together. I didn't feel safe and I was checking on my car throughout the night. My advice is to really weigh your pros and cons and see if you can budget for a different hotel.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear LillyEmber,
We apologize for the bad experience you had with us.  We try hard to make everybody feel comfortable and safe and again we apologize that you didn't feel that way.  We ask that you contact us at (307)235-2711 to see how we can make it up to you.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Quaint stay
data.text: I stayed here after seeing that the Casper lodge wasn't done with their remodel. It was a nice stay. Very reasonable price 59.95 for one night. Very Friendly Front desk staff. Told me about a place called poor boys, and the fort for a steak dinner. My wife and I wanted a smoking room, and unfortunately it had to be on the second floor, but climbing the stairs was better than standing in the wind. We stayed in room 201. The bed was very comfortable, and it was away from the highway which i figure can be noisy like most that are right along side them. The shower was very nice, didn't have to wait more than a minute for it to warm up. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling through town. The only Change i would recommend would be putting smoking rooms on the ground floor for the elderly and bigger people that have trouble with stairs. All in all had a nice time.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  We apologize that we don't have Smoking rooms on the ground floor and for any inconvenience this may have caused you.  However, we are pleased to hear that you found your room to be clean and comfortable.  We appreciate your business and hope you will stay with us again soon.

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: What a Disappointment !
data.text: We booked here based on others reviews.  It was terrible.  First room we got the bathroom fan sounded like it was going to take off, bed sagged badly,  carpet filthy, lone chair was not useable, drapes hanging off the window and didnt cover the window even when repaired, and our room fronted the interstate and was very noisy.  We changed rooms to the other end of the hall, room equally tired,  filthy carpet, noisy, no ice bucket or glasses, bathroom sink plumbing leaked all over the floor, slow internet, would NOT recommend this place to anyone!

data.title: Better Than You'd Expect
data.text: If you havent noticed, there arent many hotels in Casper, or there's just a lot going on in this city. It was late and I just needed a room for the night, passing through on a motorcycle trip. There were a few rooms in the area but they were outrageously priced. It took me a while to get to this review so I don't remember the price but it was much better than all the big chain hotels in the area. Clean, friendly, not much of a breakfast but that's ok because it was close to a few other places to eat. The room was a bit on the small side, but very clean and everything worked. I would stay there again.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Kyle T,
We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay with us during your motorcycle trip.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found everything to be clean and working well.  We hope that we will see you again soon on another trip.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not the Hilton but it worked
data.text: We give this place 4 stars because of the value for the price paid.  We had been in the area and where trying to get away from the bike rally at Sturgis and settled on Casper.  This place is an older property that has some charm.  The rooms are clean, and the bed was comfortable and it had a big TV.  This place is close to the freeway so you do pick up some road noise but for me I sleep with the AC fan on and it pretty much drowns out all the outside noises.  The breakfast int he morning is served in the lobby that consists of waffles, bagels, danishes etc.  There is limited space to sit in the lobby so we just grabbed a bowl of cereal and coffee and went back to our room.  Casper was a fun little town to visit, kinda windy but thats the high plains for ya.  So for a little over $60 a night I think this was a good place for us to stay for a few days.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Andy M,
We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found it to be of good value. We appreciate your business very much and we hope that you will stay with us again in the near future.  Thank you!

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A little pricey, but a nice place to stay
data.text: I stayed here on the way to Sturgis.  For your basic room with a fridge and microwave, I felt it was a little pricey at $74, but maybe that was because of the high volume of bike traffic. Clean room, comfy bed, nice staff, mini breakfast.  I would stay here again.  Don't let the area deter you from staying here.  It is as safe as anywhere else.

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Dennis S,
Thank you for letting us know about your stay with us while you were on your stay to Sturgis.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that your room was comfortable and the staff was friendly.  We appreciate your business very much and hope you will stay with us again soon.

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Interesting
data.text: I arrived late 11:45 pm. It took 15 minutes to get the women in front of me checked in. Once to the room, I opened the bathroom where there was fog on the mirror as if someone just finished a shower. There were long black hairs around the bathroom and upon further inspection the floor was wet, (and the kicker here) there was a dirty/wet towel shoved back into the clean folded towel rack ...??? Pretty gross and very strange... I was too tired to complain. Bed was comfy, wifi worked, and price was cheap so overall not horrible. What can you expect when you travel budget ...?

owner_response.author: National9inns, Manager at National 9 Inn Casper Showboat Motel, responded to this review
owner_response.text:

We sincerely apologize about what occurred during your stay. I have talked with our staff to get to the bottom of this issue so it never happens again.  I encourage you to contact us to give us some more information so we can solve this issue.  Thank you.

R. Howell - Regional Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A good older hotel if you are a family or are traveling light for a good niights sleep I recommend
data.text:
Positive Features – clean room, good breakfast, fun Hollywood memorabilia, very welcoming staff, quiet room, low rate, refrigerator and microwave, private WIFI in room.
Negative Features – no hair dryer, iron, TV remote needed replacement, due for an upgrade in two years. 
older hotel in well treated used condition
